node.title: krut_tomb
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `krut_tomb` ( `krut_tomb_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type_nodetype` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `killa_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reputation` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`krut_tomb_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
